languages.text: "{name}, ты закаляешь тело водными процедурами? Похвально! Позволь поделиться несколькими упражнениями водной гимнастики из моих времен в {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Схола Прогениум{/g}!" {n}Не дожидаясь ответа, Сестра битвы приступает к объяснениям.{/n}
languages.translation_comment: Арджента — стартует анимация (луп из 3 анимаций типа "руки в стороны", "поклон", "разогнулась")
Арджента — стартует анимация (луп из 3 анимаций типа "руки в стороны", "поклон", "разогнулась")

languages.text: "{name}, are you conditioning your body with water treatments? How commendable! Allow me to share some of the water exercises I learned at the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}!" {n}Argenta does not wait for a reply, but immediately launches into a series of detailed instructions.{/n}

languages.text: « {name}, utilisez-vous l'hydrothérapie pour conditionner votre corps ? Voilà une activité des plus louables ! Permettez-moi de vous montrer certains des exercices que j'ai appris à la {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g} ! » {n}Sans attendre votre réponse, Argenta se met à énoncer une série d'instructions détaillées.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{name}, are you conditioning your body with water treatments? How commendable! Allow me to share some of the water exercises I learned at the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}!" {n}Argenta does not wait for a reply, but immediately launches into a series of detailed instructions.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « {name}, utilisez-vous l'hydrothérapie pour conditionner votre corps ? Voilà une activité des plus louables ! Permettez-moi de vous montrer certains des exercices que j'ai appris à la {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g} ! » {n}Sans attendre votre réponse, Argenta se met à énoncer une série d'instructions détaillées.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «{name}, ¿está condicionando su cuerpo con tratamientos de agua? ¡Encomiable! ¡Permita que comparta con usted algunos de los ejercicios acuáticos que aprendí en la {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}!». {n}Argenta no espera a tu respuesta y empieza a darte una serie de instrucciones detalladas.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{name}, are you conditioning your body with water treatments? How commendable! Allow me to share some of the water exercises I learned at the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}!" {n}Argenta does not wait for a reply, but immediately launches into a series of detailed instructions.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «{name}, ¿está condicionando su cuerpo con tratamientos de agua? ¡Encomiable! ¡Permita que comparta con usted algunos de los ejercicios acuáticos que aprendí en la {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}!». {n}Argenta no espera a tu respuesta y empieza a darte una serie de instrucciones detalladas.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “{name}，你是在利用流水的力量调理你的身体吗？真是值得称赞！让我传授给你我在{g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}忠嗣学院{/g}学到的水中锻炼动作吧！”{n}阿洁塔没有等待你的答复，而是立刻说出了一连串详细的动作指令。{/n}
languages.original_text: "{name}, are you conditioning your body with water treatments? How commendable! Allow me to share some of the water exercises I learned at the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}!" {n}Argenta does not wait for a reply, but immediately launches into a series of detailed instructions.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “{name}，你是在利用流水的力量调理你的身体吗？真是值得称赞！让我传授给你我在{g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}忠嗣学院{/g}学到的水中锻炼动作吧！”{n}阿洁塔没有等待你的答复，而是立刻说出了一连串详细的动作指令。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「{name}、水治療で体のコンディションを整えていますか？素晴らしい！私が{g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}帝国教導院{/g}で学んだ水中トレーニングを紹介させてください」 {n}アルジェンタは返事を待たず、すぐに詳しい説明を始めた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "{name}, are you conditioning your body with water treatments? How commendable! Allow me to share some of the water exercises I learned at the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}!" {n}Argenta does not wait for a reply, but immediately launches into a series of detailed instructions.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「{name}、水治療で体のコンディションを整えていますか？素晴らしい！私が{g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}帝国教導院{/g}で学んだ水中トレーニングを紹介させてください」 {n}アルジェンタは返事を待たず、すぐに詳しい説明を始めた。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "{name}, konditioniert Ihr Euren Körper durch Wasserbehandlungen? Sehr löblich! Gestattet mir, Euch einige der Wasserübungen vorzustellen, die ich in der {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g} gelernt habe!" {n}Argenta wartet nicht auf eine Antwort, sondern beginnt sofort, dir sehr detaillierte Anweisungen zu geben.{/n}

languages.text: "{name}, su tedavisiyle bedenine bakım mı yapıyorsun? Akıllıca! Seninle {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}'da öğrendiğim bazı su egzersizlerini paylaşayım!" {n}Argenta, yanıt vermeni beklemeden bir dizi detaylı yönerge anlatmaya başlıyor.{/n}
